div.p: Governor Justice has announced that all public schools will be closed at the close of school today, March 13, “for as long as we have to close them.”

In accordance with this directive, Calhoun County Schools will be closed from Friday, March 13 until Governor Justice openings schools again. Calhoun County Students need to complete Snow packets 1-5 next week. Student’s names and grades need to be on the packets. Day 1 packet will be due on Wednesday, March 18. Bus drivers will be running their routes on a three-hour delay schedule to deliver meals. All students can receive two meals at that time. Students and caregivers will need to meet the bus. Please be patient while we establish times. Additional information will be posted on our social medial and web site. The Board of Education meeting will still be held on Monday, March 16, at CMHS at 5:30. We will not be having the student recognition. Those will be held at a later time.
